title: Kansas City Royals average ticket price 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2010 to 2011, slightly decreasing from 2011 to 2012, gradually increasing from 2012 to 2015, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 29.76 was reached at Year 2015
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 18.95 was reported at Year 2011
